mean_en: the act or policy of separating people of different races, religions or sexes and treating them in a different way; the act of separating people or things from a larger group
sentence: The segregation of the prisoners prevented them from fighting.
sentence_trans: 犯人被隔离开，防止他们打起来。
word_etyma: se分开 + greg群体 + ation名词后缀 → segregation种族隔离
